__TOC__

* Event: This month's <nowiki>[[http://loco.ubuntu.com/events/ubuntu-us-wisconsin/1096/detail/|Milwaukee Ubuntu Hour]]</nowiki> was December 2. There was one attendee. Milwaukee Ubuntu Hours have been event suspended pending a revamp - different time/place, better publicizing.

* Event: This month's <nowiki>[[http://loco.ubuntu.com/events/ubuntu-us-wisconsin/1089/detail/|Madison Ubuntu Hour]]</nowiki> was December 21. This event is on the third Saturday of each month, and is hosted by <nowiki>[[http://madisonlinux.org/|Madison LUG]]</nowiki>. The next Madison Ubuntu Hour will be January 21.

* Monthly Meeting: Due to scheduling conflicts, there was no meeting this month. The busy schedule of some members is expected to continue through much of the winter. Other members are encouraged to take up the slack!
